The image was published in a Facebook po: 2020, and has been shared more than 2,900 times.
The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image claims that Sri Lanka is ready to export 500 unibuffel vehicles to the American military, stating that the "good governance period" of importing everything is over.
The phrase: good governance period" refers to the government elected in 2015, which was led by the coalition of the United National Front for Good Governance and former Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.
The Sri Lanka Army spokesperson confirme: The vehicles shown in the image were actually built for deployment in Mali to aid United Nations peacekeeping forces.
